entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes #52975
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext #52974
  • Adding Roles to a Blazor Web project does not work #52970
  • [Infrastructure] Update NPM dependencies as part of build-ops #52966
  • [Infrastructure] JS infrastructure next steps #52965
  • [Blazor] Modernize and Centralize our JS build infrastructure #52964
  • [Blazor] Centralize JS dependencies #52963
  • In ASP.NET 8, IReadOnlyCollection<> controller parameters do not bind from request body by default #52962
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot #52958

Closed

  • Perf improvement: mvc #52950
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #52957
  • Update QuickGrid virtualization sample to remove TODO to use @bind:after #52004
    9.0-preview1
  • Build fails with node 20 #48146
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unhandled exception when running new Blazor Web App from following tutorial at https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/aspnet/blazor-tutorial/intro #52680
  • In Dmain Driven Design (DDD) , Should be use the IRepository contract in the application layer or in the domain layer? #51511
    Discussions
  • [Feature] Generate multiple Razor Pages css isolation bundles #52927
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #52951
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #52941
  • Web Farm with IIS10 Servers | Content Server: HTTP Error 500.0 - ASP.NET Core IIS hosting failure (in-process) #51764
  • Static file change during build causes browser refresh failure #39062
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Virtualize + CSS Snap scrolls uncontrollably on Chromium-based browsers #30203
    Planning: WebUI
  • Investigate behavior of Blazor Server on mobile when switching apps #26985
    Planning: WebUI
  • Publish Blazor wasm hosted with x64 Platform on the server results in RuntimeIdentifier compatibility exception #43749
    Planning: WebUI
  • Missing TypeCheck in generated razor class in case of CreateInferredEventCallback #28949
    Planning: WebUI
  • FocusAsync does not focus on input on initial load on Chrome / Edge but does on Firefox #33447
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Server with OpenIdConnect authentication fails when trying to sign out #51702
    Planning: WebUI
  • @onchange not bubbling in Blazor #34758
    Planning: WebUI
  • Graph demo component/controller in the hosted WASM project template? #45394
    Planning: WebUI
  • Support HostedServices in Blazor #7213
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52973
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52972
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52971
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 8.0.x
  • Use an image w/ node for SourceBuild #52969
    area-infrastructure
  • Reenable HTTPs tests #52967
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `530d5c8` to `cde9a74` #52961
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix component governance alerts #52954
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Cleanups from the move to NPM #52959
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Test failure] Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.FunctionalTests.StartupTests.WrongApplicationPath_FailedToRun #52890
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Move back to NPM #52914
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix app_offline detection for some OSes #52810
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
